name: HERO Unit - 911 Dispatch Simulator
description:
HERO Unit is a retro app-like text game that puts the player in the shoes of 911 dispatchers.

Features:
-No Ads & IAP
-21 Different callers and scenarios.
-No time restrictions.
-Multiple endings for each call.
-News articles that reflects your actions.

"Rescue The World. One Person at a Time."
